param-doc.name: sentenceRole
param-doc.p: Role of the sentence in tuples representing dependencies.

param-doc.name: sentenceLayerName
param-doc.p: Layer containing sentences.

param-doc.name: nBest
param-doc.p: Number of parses to obtain in each sentence.

param-doc.name: biology
param-doc.p: Use the parsing model adapted to biomedical texts.

param-doc.name: dependencyDependentRole
param-doc.p: Role of the dependent token in tuples representing dependencies.

param-doc.name: wordLayerName
param-doc.p: Layer containing tokens.

param-doc.name: dependencyLabelFeature
param-doc.p: Feature where to store the dependency label.

param-doc.name: posFeature
param-doc.p: POS feature of the token.

param-doc.name: parseStatusFeature
param-doc.p: Feature where to store the parse status.

param-doc.name: wordFormFeature
param-doc.p: Surface form feature of the token.

param-doc.name: dependentTypeFeature
param-doc.p: Feature where to store the dependent type.

param-doc.name: parseNumberFeature
param-doc.p: Feature where to store the parse tree number.

param-doc.name: dependencyLabelFeatureName
param-doc.p: Deprecated alias for dependencyLabelFeature

param-doc.name: posFeatureName
param-doc.p: Deprecated alias for posFeature

param-doc.name: parseStatusFeatureName
param-doc.p: Deprecated alias for parseStatusFeature

param-doc.name: wordFormFeatureName
param-doc.p: Deprecated alias for wordFormFeature

param-doc.name: dependentTypeFeatureName
param-doc.p: Deprecated alias for dependentTypeFeature

param-doc.name: parseNumberFeatureName
param-doc.p: Deprecated alias for parseNumberFeatureName

param-doc.name: enjuEncoding
param-doc.p: Character encoding used by Enju input and output files.

param-doc.name: dependencyHeadRole
param-doc.p: Role of the head (governor) token in tuples representing dependencies.

param-doc.name: dependenciesRelationName
param-doc.p: Relation where to store dependencies.

param-doc.name: enjuExecutable
param-doc.p: Path to the Enju executable file.
